snippet: Despite some nods to convention, Independent 2015 still feels more like an art experience than a shopping experience, and that sets it apart from the competition.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibits at Independent 2015 art fair.
lead_paragraph: Despite some nods to convention, Independent 2015 still feels more like an art experience than a shopping experience, and that sets it apart from the competition.

headline.main: Review: Independent Art Fair Combines Less Is More and Growth
headline.print_headline: An Art Fair Combines Less Is More and Growth
